options.title: -E external[:internal], --encoding external[:internal]
options.description:
Same as `ruby -E' . Specifies the default value(s) for external encodings and internal encoding. Values should be separated with colon (:).

You can omit the one for internal encodings, then the value (Encoding.default_internal) will be nil.

options.title: -E external[:internal], --encoding external[:internal]
options.description:
Same as `ruby -E' . Specifies the default value(s) for external encodings and internal encoding. Values should be separated with colon (:).

You can omit the one for internal encodings, then the value (Encoding.default_internal) will be nil.

options.title: -U
options.description: Same as `ruby -U' . Sets the default value for internal encodings (Encoding.default_internal) to UTF-8.

options.title: -h, --help
options.description: Prints a summary of the options.

options.title: -h, --help
options.description: Prints a summary of the options.

options.title: -r library
options.description: Same as `ruby -r'. Causes irb to load the library using require.

options.title: --inspect
options.description: Uses `inspect' for output (default except for bc mode)

options.title: --extra-doc-dir
options.description: Add an extra doc dir for the doc dialog.

options.title: --prompt mode, --prompt-mode mode
options.description: Switch prompt mode. Pre-defined prompt modes are `default', `simple', `xmp' and `inf-ruby'.

options.title: --prompt mode, --prompt-mode mode
options.description: Switch prompt mode. Pre-defined prompt modes are `default', `simple', `xmp' and `inf-ruby'.

options.title: --inf-ruby-mode
options.description: Uses prompt appropriate for inf-ruby-mode on emacs. Suppresses --multiline and --singleline.

options.title: --tracer
options.description: Displays trace for each execution of commands.

options.title: --back-trace-limit n
options.description: Displays backtrace top n and tail n. The default value is 16.
